zh_CN: 有一次我在家里发现了一件很奇葩的事情，家里的椅子和桌子重叠在了一起！而且还在不停地抽搐！
en: One time, I found something really strange at home. The chair and the table were overlapping each other! And they kept twitching!

zh_CN: 当时把我吓坏了，还以为出现了幻觉，那应该是什么bug吧！
en: I was so scared at the time, I thought I was hallucinating. It must've been some kind of bug!
